rule.description: `TrustManager` that accepts all certificates
rule.name: java/insecure-trustmanager

message.text: This uses TrustManager, which is defined in SslSender$NaiveTrustManager and trusts any certificate.

rule.description: Overly permissive regular expression range
rule.name: py/overly-large-range

message.text: Suspicious character range that overlaps with a-z in the same character class, and is equivalent to \[A-Z\\[\\\\]^_`a-z\].
